original_title: Udarata Menike engine catches fire at Haputale Railway Station
original_body_lines: Haputale, June 3 (Daily Mirror)- The rear engine of the Udarata Menike train bound to Badulla from Colombo caught fire at the Haputale Railway Station this afternoon.
Staff at the Haputale Railway Station and the police managed to douse the fire with assistance of the  residents.
